title: Harlem Film House Founder on Telling Everyone's Story
itunes:title: Harlem Film House Founder on Telling Everyone's Story
description:
CR Capers, Founder and CEO of Harlem Film House, discusses supporting independent and marginalized filmmakers in New York City.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
